document.docAuthor: Ziani, Stefano, Abdel-Dayem, Mahmoud Saleh, Aldhafer, Hathal Mohammed & Barbero, Enrico
document.masterDocTitle: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature quotes .
SAUDI
ARABIA
: Asir Province , Wadi Baish [actually in Jizan Province ]; Mishaqa; Thamila ( Paulian 1948 ). Asir Province , Maraba, village Quaraah, Khamis; Wadi Hesua nr. Wadi ad Villa; Wadi Shumran ( Zunino 1979 , 1981 ). Asir / Jizan Provinces, Abha-Gizan Km 53 Wadi ad Dilla ( Zunino 1979 ). Jizan Province , Farasan islands; Hakimah. Makkah Province , Bahara, Jiddah ( Zunino 1981 ).
YEMEN
: Lahij Governorate , Lahej ( Balthasar 1972 ). San’a’ Governorate , ‘Asr, 3 miles W San’a’ ; Gheil al Alaf. Dhamar Governorate , Birkat Gheil Masnah. Dhala Governorate , Ghaiman; Dhala ; Jabal Harir; Jebel Girwan. Abyan Governorate , Mukayras ( Paulian 1948 ).
OMAN
: Ash Sharqiyah Governorate , Sharqiya Sands (Rössner & Ziani in
Ziani et al . 2015
).
UNITED
ARAB
EMIR-
ATES : Abu Dhabi Emirate, Jebel Hafeet ( Howarth & Gillett 2004 ). Abu Dhabi Emirate, Al-Ajban; Swaihan. Fijairah Emirate, Bithnah. Umm al-Quwain Emirate, near ad-Dhaid, oasis Tawi as-Saman. Fujaira Emirate, Fujaira; Wadi Maidaq; Wadi Safad. Dubai Emirate, Hatta. Ras al-Khaimah Emirate, Khor Khuwair; Wadi Bih. Sharjah Emirate, Mahafiz; Khor Kalba; Sharjah Desert Park ( Král & Batelka 2017 ). Sharjah Emirate, Fujairah—Wadi Hello, SW of Khor Kalba (Rössner & Ziani in
Ziani et al . 2015
).

Distribution . Arabian Peninsula: Oman (Rössner & Ziani in
Ziani et al . 2015
),
Saudi Arabia
, Yemen ( Paulian 1948 ), United Arab Emirates ( Howarth & Gillett 2004 ). North Africa: Egypt ( Baraud 1985 ). Africa : nearly all the Afrotropical Region (d’Orbigny 1913a). Asia: Afghanistan , Iran , Iraq , Pakistan ( Ziani & Bezděk 2016 ).

Remarks . Rössner & Ziani in
Ziani et al . (2015)
mistakenly placed the locality Wadi Hello, SW of Khor Kalba in Qatar . Actually it is in United Arab Emirates . Qatar should be deleted from the countries from where
O. variegatus
is recorded, even the presence of this species in the state is very much likely.
